EmailTemplate.description: Send to all your current prospects and customers to invite them to this event
EmailTemplate.name: EMEA:UK: SAE May Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Gain the Collaborative Edge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PGi, the Meetings Experts
Complexity Enemy at the IT Gate: How to Make Sense of the Collaboration Clutter Business Breakthrough Leadership Series
{!Lead.FirstName},
How would you describe your current collaboration strategy?
Perhaps you have old legacy solutions still in place but are hoping to invest in new robust solutions for the future. Sometimes understanding the right route to take can prove challenging.
Well this webinar will address these points and offer up an engaging discussion leveraging the expertise and past experiences of our expert speakers.
Register now for this Webinar on May 20th where our expert panelists will help you:
How to make sense of the multitude of options available to enterprise organisations when developing a robust solution for collaboration as part of a wider UC strategy Consider the implications of legacy solutions still in place when building for the future Build sustainable and flexible solutions ready for deployment and fit for the future
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Phone}
Who should attend: This seminar is ideal for B2B business leaders who want to learn more about how to leverage the right collaborative solution to acheive sustainable competitive advantage When: Monday, May 20th Time: 2:00PM BST 9:00AM EDT
Eric Masseboeuf, Head of International Voice Business Unit Orange Business Services Phil Goldby, Managing Director, EMEA of Sherpa Digital Media William A. Haskins, Senior Analyst & Partner Wainhouse Research
AWARDS & ACCOLADES
2012 Silver Edison Award Best New Product, iMeet
2012 Silver Stevie Award Most Innovative Tech Company of the Year
2011 Stevie Award People's Choice, iMeet
